config.tectonic.title: Tectonic Config
config.tectonic.option.snow_start_offset:
Offsets the y-level snow starts at.
Default: §e128
Increases the max build and generation height to y640.
config.tectonic.option.lava_rivers.toolt: Toggles the deep underground rivers at the lava level.
config.tectonic.option.ocean_offset.tool:
Skews terrain towards or away from oceans. Lower values = more oceans.
Default: §e-0.8
Horizontally scales continents. Lower values = larger continents and oceans between them.
Default: §e0.13
config.tectonic.option.erosion_scale.too:
Horizontally scales erosion, primarily impacting mountains. Lower values = thicker mountain ranges and terrain between them.
Default: §e0.25
config.tectonic.option.flat_terrain_skew:
Skews terrain towards or away from flat terrain. Lower values = more plateaus and valleys.
Default: §e0.1
config.tectonic.option.use_vanilla_shapi: Removes Tectonic's custom ocean shaping, using the vanilla one instead.
config.tectonic.option.ocean_depth.toolt:
0 is at sea level, -0.5 is 64 blocks below sea level.
Default: §e-0.22
0 is at sea level, -0.5 is 64 blocks below sea level.
Default: §e-0.45
config.tectonic.option.remove_frozen_oce: Removes the surface ice from Frozen Oceans, making them as navigable as Deep Frozen Oceans.
